statements: SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7.5;
SELECT source_id, location, measurement_date FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE dissolved_oxygen < 5.0;
SELECT location, pH, turbidity FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE turbidity BETWEEN 2.0 AND 4.0;
SELECT source_id, dissolved_oxygen FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH < 6.8;
SELECT source_id, location, measurement_date, pH, dissolved_oxygen, turbidity FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(pH), AVG(dissolved_oxygen), AVG(turbidity) FROM water_quality_measurements GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7 AND dissolved_oxygen > 5
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS measurement_count FROM water_quality_measurements GROUP BY location HAVING measurement_count > 10
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY source_id DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_id = 1;
SELECT location, measurement_value FROM WaterQualityMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM MeasurementSources WHERE source_location = 'River';
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_value > 5.0;
SELECT source_name, location, measurement_datetime FROM WaterQualityMeasurements INNER JOIN MeasurementSources ON WaterQualityMeasurements.source_id = MeasurementSources.source_id;
SELECT location, measurement_datetime, measurement_value FROM WaterQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_value > 7.5 ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_location FROM MeasurementSources WHERE source_type = 'River' ORDER BY source_location;

SELECT measurement_id, location, source_name, measurement_datetime FROM WaterQualityMeasurements JOIN MeasurementSources ON WaterQualityMeasurements.source_id = MeasurementSources.source_id WHERE location LIKE '%Lake%' ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_value BETWEEN 6.0 AND 8.0 ORDER BY measurement_value DESC, measurement_datetime ASC;

SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS measurement_count FROM WaterQualityMeasurements JOIN MeasurementSources ON WaterQualityMeasurements.source_id = MeasurementSources.source_id GROUP BY source_name HAVING measurement_count > 5 ORDER BY measurement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT source_id, measurement_date, pH FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, source_id, location FROM water_quality_measurements JOIN measurement_sources ON water_quality_measurements.source_id = measurement_sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM measurement_errors WHERE error_type = 'Calibration';
SELECT source_id, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM water_quality_measurements GROUP BY source_id ORDER BY total_measurements DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH > 7.5 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM measurement_sources WHERE source_id = 3;

SELECT measurement_id, error_type, error_description FROM water_quality_measurements JOIN measurement_errors ON water_quality_measurements.measurement_id = measurement_errors.measurement_id WHERE error_type = 'calibration' ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(pH) AS avg_pH, AVG(turbidity) AS avg_turbidity FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE pH < 6 OR turbidity > 5 ORDER BY turbidity DESC, measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources;
SELECT measurement_date, ph_level, turbidity FROM Measurements;
SELECT source_id, measurement_date, turbidity FROM Measurements;
SELECT parameter_name, value FROM Parameters JOIN MeasurementParameters ON Parameters.parameter_id = MeasurementParameters.parameter_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM WaterSources ORDER BY source_name ASC;

SELECT m.measurement_id, m.measurement_date, m.ph_level, p.parameter_name, mp.value FROM Measurements m JOIN MeasurementParameters mp ON m.measurement_id = mp.measurement_id JOIN Parameters p ON mp.parameter_id = p.parameter_id WHERE m.turbidity > 5;

SELECT w.source_name, m.measurement_date, p.parameter_name, mp.value FROM WaterSources w JOIN Measurements m ON w.source_id = m.source_id JOIN MeasurementParameters mp ON m.measurement_id = mp.measurement_id JOIN Parameters p ON mp.parameter_id = p.parameter_id WHERE m.ph_level < 7;

SELECT w.source_name, COUNT(m.measurement_id) AS measurement_count, AVG(m.turbidity) AS avg_turbidity FROM WaterSources w JOIN Measurements m ON w.source_id = m.source_id GROUP BY w.source_name HAVING COUNT(m.measurement_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurements;
SELECT measurement_time, ph_level, turbidity FROM WaterQualityMeasurements;
SELECT source_name, location FROM MeasurementSources;
SELECT *, result_value FROM MeasurementResults;
SELECT measurement_id, source_id, measurement_time, ph_level, turbidity FROM WaterQualityMeasurements;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityMeasurements;
SELECT source_name, location, contact_person FROM MeasurementSources ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_time, ph_level, turbidity FROM WaterQualityMeasurements WHERE ph_level > 7.0;

SELECT m.measurement_id, s.source_name, m.measurement_time, r.result_value FROM WaterQualityMeasurements m JOIN MeasurementResults r ON m.measurement_id = r.measurement_id JOIN MeasurementSources s ON m.source_id = s.source_id WHERE r.result_value < 5.0;
SELECT tag_name, description FROM MeasurementTags WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
